text.name: function_smallUniversalSilo
text.text: You can store all grain types, food for your animals and even seeds or fertilizer in this silo. Place this silo near your animal pasture and make the feeding easier.

text.name: function_refillTankSeed
text.text: You can refill your sowing machines at this tank. Note: Refilling will cost you a higher price for seed than buying it in BigBags at the Shop.

text.name: function_refillTankChemicals
text.text: You can refill your sprayers and fertilizer spreaders at this tank. Note: Refilling will cost you a higher price than buying it in BigBags or pallets at the Shop.

text.name: function_gasStation
text.text: You can refuel your vehicles at this tank. Refueling from this tank is more expensive, you are paying a fee for delivering the fuel to your farm.

text.name: function_machineshed
text.text: You can store your vehicles and items in this shed.

text.name: function_multished
text.text: You can store your vehicles and items or your harvested crops in this shed.

text.name: function_fenceANDgate
text.text: TIP: If you want to have gate too, place the fence first and then gate!

text.name: function_fencePlacement
text.text: TIP: Edit terrain before placing fence, so it is not too steep - for better placement of the fence.

text.name: function_productTrailer
text.text: This trailer can be used to transport products from your factories instead of using pallets. If you already have spawned some pallets, products can be loaded into this trailer from pallets as well.

text.name: function_fuelTank
text.text: With this trailer you can refill fuel in your vehicles and also in your factories, which requires fuel as input.

text.name: function_seedMaker
text.text: Seed Maker makes seeds using grain of your choice and liquid fertilizer.

text.name: function_manureMaker
text.text: Manure Maker makes manure using straw, water and grass or hay.

text.name: function_fertilizerMaker
text.text: Fertilizer Maker makes fertilizer using manure and water.

text.name: function_pigFoodMixer
text.text: Pig Food Mixer makes pig food using potato or sugar beet, water and whole grain.

text.name: function_grainMill
text.text: Grain Mill makes whole grain using wheat or barley and maize.

text.name: function_cartonProduction
text.text: In Carton Production you can make your own carton using wood chips and water.

text.name: function_emptyPallets
text.text: Empty pallets are used in your factories, to be able to transport your products.

text.name: function_cartonPallet
text.text: Carton is used in your factories, to be able to transport your products.

text.name: function_cementPallet
text.text: Cement is used in concrete plant to produce bricks.

text.name: function_dynamitePallet
text.text: Dynamite is used in the quarry to blast rocks.

text.name: function_fuelCanister
text.text: This fuel canister can be used to refill fuel in your factories, which requires fuel as input. It can also be used to refuel your vehicles.

text.name: function_fuelBarrel
text.text: This fuel barrel can be used to refill fuel in your factories, which requires fuel as input. It can also be used to refuel your vehicles.

text.name: snowContract01_text
text.text: The whole loading yard is covered in snow. Trucks can not go through, we are unable to load trains and transport the goods. Please clear the area as much as possible, including both entrances. Make sure, to be clearing the snow during our opening hours. (6:00 - 22:00)

text.name: snowContract02_text
text.text: Our yard is covered with snow. Transporting of our goods is very difficult in this condition. Please clear the whole area. Make sure, to be clearing the snow during our opening hours. (7:00 - 16:00)

text.name: snowContract03_text
text.text: The snow is making our job with animals very difficult. Clear the whole yard and road, starting from main road to our company. Make sure, to be clearing the snow during our opening hours. (7:00 - 19:00)

text.name: snowContract04_text
text.text: Some trucks got stuck in snow, others can not go through. Please make our loading yard accessible as soon as possible.

text.name: snowContract05_text
text.text: Please take the snow plow or snow thrower and remove the snow off the Farm Road, or use the road salt if possible. Clear the snow starting from town and all the way back to rail tracks. This road is very important for transport, for us farmers.

text.name: snowContract06_text
text.text: Snow is making the Riverside Road very dangerous to drive on. Take snow plow and pull the snow of the road, starting on main raod and all the way to my farm (Wright Agribusiness) Me, horse ranch and Vegetablebase owners will be very greatful.

text.name: snowContract07_text
text.text: Use some suitable equipment for snow plowing and clear the Industrial Road, starting from main road, around Transport Company and ending in Furniture Fabrication.

text.name: snowContract08_text
text.text: The company, which got paid for clearing the snow in our town kinda failed. They left smaller streets covered in snow. Take the snow plow and clear remaining streets. Please do not pull the snow to entrances of our houses, if possible. (it is recommended to switch off traffic during this mission.)

text.name: snowContract09_text
text.text: The gas station is filled with snow. Our clients can not safely refuel their vehicles. Please clear out the whole area and the exit road.

e.v: Seed Maker makes seeds using grain of your choice and liquid fertilizer.
Manure Maker makes manure using straw, water and grass or hay.
Fertilizer Maker makes fertilizer using manure and water.
Pig Food Mixer makes pig food using potato or sugar beet, water and whole grain.
Grain Mill makes whole grain using wheat or barley and maize.

In sawmill you can produce boards and sell them for better profit then logs.
Boards can also be used to produce empty pallets in Pallet Fabrication, so you do not need to purchase empty pallets in a shop.
Pallet Fabrication is a part of the sawmill.

With your own pallet fabrication you do not need to purchase empty pallets, you can produce your own.
Empty pallets are required in other factories.
Pallet Fabrication is a part of the sawmill.

In Soy Milk Production you can produce soy milk, which will give you mutch better income then selling soybeans alone.
As a side product there is pig food which can be served to your pigs. And liquid manure for your fields, or you can sell it to someone who needs it more.

Turn your milk into more profitable dairy products in Dairy.
Dairy products can be sold to local foodstuffs or elsewhere through transport company.

In Meat Factory you can produce meat products from your animals.
When you unload animals they are converted to units: cow - 2500, pig - 700, sheep - 700.
Meat products can be sold to local foodstuffs or elsewhere through transport company.

Blasting Office requires dynamite. Blasting Office technicians will take care of stable income of stone and soil rich in gold. Stone Crusher is used to produce gravel using stone. If you have more stone than you manage to consume, stone can also be sold to Transport Company. Using Gold Separator you can find some gold in soil, produced from Blasting Office. Gold can be exchanged for money in the bank. The rest output material (stone) can be sold or used in other production. In the Concrete Plant you can produce bricks using gravel, water, cement and empty pallets. Bricks can be sold to Transport Company. If you have more gravel than you manage to consume, gravel can also be sold to Transport Company.

In this orchard facility you can make fruits and vegetables: apples, apricots, plums, pears, tomatoes, green pepper and lettuce.
Local foodstuffs will welcome your fresh fruits and vegetables.
You need: Water, Fuel, Manure and Empty pallets.

In Carton Produciton you can make your own carton using wood chips and water, and save a little bit of money.
You will also need empty pallets to transport your carton.
